section.title: Ready to invest in your future?

items.question: What is the difference between your AI and ChatGPT?
items.answer: Our AI is trained on 200 successful Ivy League personal statements, supplemental essays and recommendation letters. It also has exclusive content on what qualities and characteristics Ivy League are looking for in applicants and uses that information to craft perfect essays. Unlike ChatGPT, It knows exactly what to write and how to write it.

items.question: Isnâ€™t your AI detectable?
items.answer: It is detectable, but it is still the most powerful tool in writing perfect drafts in minutes. There are millions of tools for editing and humanizing your content, so it is not a problem

items.question: I know nothing about admissions, is this suitable for me?
items.answer: Yes! This program starts teaching from absolute zero.

items.question: I'm in 7th grade, is it too early for me?
items.answer: No! The earlier you start, the better your chances of getting into the world's best universities. It's best to start preparing in grades 7-8. Considering that the materials will stay with you forever - this is the best investment right now!
